Package org.spongepowered.api.network

Interface RemoteConnection

All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientSideConnection, EngineConnection, LocalPlayerConnection, PlayerConnection, RconConnection, ServerPlayerConnection, ServerSideConnection
public interface RemoteConnection

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    InetSocketAddress
    address()
    Gets the InetSocketAddress of this connection.
    void
    close()
    Closes the connection.
    InetSocketAddress
    virtualHost()
    Gets the host name the connection is connecting to the server with.

  • Method Details

    • address

      InetSocketAddress address()
      Gets the InetSocketAddress of this connection.
      Returns:
      The address

    • virtualHost

      InetSocketAddress virtualHost()
      Gets the host name the connection is connecting to the server with.

      Examples include: If a player is connecting to `mc.example.com`, the hostname will show `mc.example.com`. This is NOT the originating hostname of the client.

      Returns:
      The host name

    • close

      void close()
      Closes the connection.
